item.title: Event Track App
item.author: adrienne.sturgeon@snhu.edu (Adrienne Sturgeon)
item.description:
I have provided a link to download the Event Track App Original and Improved Versions Here: Event Track App

Event Track App: Artifact Enhancement Narrative

What is the artifact? When was it created?

The Event Track App is a mobile Android application originally built as part of my software development coursework in CS-360. It is designed to help users log, view, and receive notifications about scheduled events. The app was created in early Februrary 2025 and refined throughout this month as part of a comprehensive enhancement process. It consists of multiple interconnected classes (MainActivity, EventDisplayActivity, RegisterActivity, SMSNotificationsActivity, and DatabaseHelper) supporting user authentication, event CRUD operations, and notification workflows.
